workflow.name: User Input
workflow.description: The user enters a question related to Assam food, festivals, or culture through the web interface.

workflow.name: Input Processing
workflow.description: The system reads the user input and identifies relevant keywords related to Assam.

workflow.name: Context Matching
workflow.description: The logic matches the user query with information defined in the custom context file (product.md).

workflow.name: Response Generation
workflow.description: A culturally accurate response is generated based on Assam-specific context.

workflow.name: Output Display
workflow.description: The generated response is displayed in the UI for the user.
